channel.title: Few questions............................HELP
channel.description: 1.) no one can logg onto my server why? 2.)do u have 2 use port fowarding?? 3.) i am using hammatchi and i have a server created should it et every one else logg n? 4.)if i am using hammatchi and it should let people logg n why isnt it??

item.title: Few questions............................HELP
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“televator0, post:2, topic:22740”]ok here is the awsners to the questions…

1.) no one can logg onto my server why?
you have to port foward you r port number, or use no-ip so you dont have to port foward.
2.)do u have 2 use port fowarding??
yes, for hamachi, no for no-ip.
3.) i am using hammatchi and i have a server created should it et every one else logg n?
forget hamachi and use no-ip
4.)if i am using hammatchi and it should let people logg n why isnt it??
because maybe you havnt advertised your server to people yet, and maybe your not running your compile.bat or your runserver.bat.[/quote]
Your answer to # 1 may not be right… post on my thread and I will help you “~!~Bryanc Help~!~” Check it out I will help you there.

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions............................HELP
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

ok here is the awsners to the questions…

1.) no one can logg onto my server why?
you have to port foward you r port number, or use no-ip so you dont have to port foward.
2.)do u have 2 use port fowarding??
yes, for hamachi, no for no-ip.
3.) i am using hammatchi and i have a server created should it et every one else logg n?
forget hamachi and use no-ip
4.)if i am using hammatchi and it should let people logg n why isnt it??
because maybe you havnt advertised your server to people yet, and maybe your not running your compile.bat or your runserver.bat.

Read full topic
